data.description: This is a VR (Virtual reality) maze game for Android mobile phone, where you should collect treasures while several creatures (Mummy, spider,...) try to catch and disturb you in a dark pyramid. You will find traps in the maze as well so it won't be an easy job for you to collect all the treasure and leave the maze. The maze, it's size, the traps and monsters' locations are random, so you will be able to play the game in many variations.

changelog.change_log:
- Using selection radial for open doors(VR eye raycaster), collect treasures and exit the maze (could be the comfort rating revised probably?)
- New textures for doors and waiting hall has other lighting settings

- Using selection radial for open doors(VR eye raycaster), collect treasures and exit the maze (could be the comfort rating revised probably?)
- New textures for doors and waiting hall has other lighting settings

- There is a new trap type -> falling rock
- There is a key, which you have to find before you can leave the maze with the collected treasures
- More trap in bigger mazes
- Spider spawn after you hit a spider's web
- Treasures have animation, easier to spot them
- You can see your life after mummy or spider hit you
- More information about the collected treasures

Technical updates:

- Better occlusion culling technique

- There is a key, which you have to find before you can leave the maze with the collected treasures
- more trap in bigger mazes
- spider spawn after you hit a spider's web
- treasures have animation, easier to spot them
- you can see your life after mummy or spider hit you
- more information about the collected treasures

Technical updates:

- better occlusion culling technique

- background to texts
- spider die after one bite and respawn
- mummy gets up after 30 secs or player's low distance from him
